segments.text: My attention is drawn to the center-left of the drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open upper cabinet, labeled "COOKIE JAR".
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already in the jar, pulling out cookies, I presume.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands below, her arm raised, clearly expecting a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so expectant, like a little conspirator.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed and tilted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's practically tipping backward, I can almost feel the wobble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These children are quite bold to attempt such a feat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be working together in their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool doesn't completely collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mischievous pair they are, I can't help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR
